name: Envy of the Xan
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Xan Weapon Upgrade Device which drops from the Mitaar Hero, Ground Chief Vortexx and 12-Man instances can be tradeskilled with 30 different Shadowlands weapons/ #L "Xan Weapon Upgrade Device" "280786" #L "Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro" "121391" #L "Lord of Envy" "244843" or #L "Lady of Envy" "244842" or #L "Superior Rebuilt Perennium Beamer" "260713" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Xan Weapon Upgrade Device + Lord of Envy = #L "Envy of the Xan" "280724" or Xan Weapon Upgrade Device + Lady of Envy = #L "Envy of the Xan" "280724" or Xan Weapon Upgrade Device + Superior Rebuilt Perennium Beamer = #L "Envy of the Xan" "280724" Note: The Envy can be further upgraded with ql150+ shop bought items: Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro + Envy of the Xan = #L "Rhat'Ata Gun" "281507"
